title: UIDOL + UDL-Based Project Design for Supporting Students with Disabilities in Online Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: For Novice Science Learners Working as Professionals in Digital Device-Provided Environments, Flexible Scheduling and Accessibility Must Be Guaranteed, with a Focus on Psycho-Emotional Well-Being and Collaborative Competencies for Students with Physical, Sensory, or Learning Disabilities

learning_goals: Learners can implement science-focused online project designs with 80% accuracy by applying UIDOL principles and UDL guidelines
Learners can integrate accessibility tools (text-to-speech, caption generation, etc.) for three or more disability types into project designs
Learners can develop and apply two or more asynchronous collaboration strategies (forums, shared documents, etc.) with peers in PBL environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
